Q: Resign commits without losing dates A:

Found it git rebase -i --root --exec 'GIT_COMMITTER_DATE=$(git show -s --format=%aD HEAD) git commit --amend --no-edit -n -S'

Q: How do I extract an array from a 2D array? A:

You have a reference to an array. You need to dereference it. Change:

my @list = $matrix[0];

to:

my @list = @{ $matrix[0] };

After that change, this is the output:

matrix: [[1, 2, 3], [4], [5, 6]]
array:  [7, 8, 9]
list:   [1, 2, 3]
size of matrix is 3
size of array is  3
size of list is   3

Refer to perldsc

Q: Cannot Install Node Sass with NPM A:

node-sass has been deprecated. You have to use sass.

You can uninstall the old and install the new one

npm uninstall node-sass

npm install sass

This fixes many issues also during installation
